ygData.subject: Re: [Re: [EQ_women] Hail and well met fellow adventuresses!]
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome to the list and there are some of us here that don t play much anymore but can answer all your questions.  My characters were: Druid - 54 Bard - 36
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome to the list and there are some of us here that don't play much anymore
but can answer all your questions. My characters were:

Druid - 54
Bard - 36
Necromancer - 29
Cleric - 22
Wizard - 22

I'm playing Dark Ages of Camelot now for a change of pace and FINALLY picked
my primary character - an Armswoman. She's my first tank and it's really fun
to have hit points and actually care about armor and weapons. I am one last
step away from my crossbow quest but still need 3 levels to acquire the skill.
I play in Albion on Percival.

Oh, and Christina, I did get my Warden to 4 on Morgan Le Fay, but after my
frist RvR experience, gonna try to settle on one character until I can do some
damage. Hibernia took two of our keeps and made an assault on Snowdonia
Station so there was a massive call to arms. At 11 all I could do was
interrupt their lowest caster and I didn't succeed in doing that more than
once *sigh* Our RvR leadership is PATHETIC! But it was a lot of fun
nonetheless.

Ice


Hail Idaini:
I play a 7 lvl cleric on Cazic Thule. Just started
playing a couple of weeks ago. Now am moving, will
have computer set up next week, have many questions
about Norrath. Thanks for joining list. Talk to ya
soon!

Sypra
--- idaini@... wrote:
> I play Idaini Egocrusher (druid), Darqheart
> Paynebringer (sk),
> Eironae (no last name yet) (chanter), and Icana
> Fixadaboobu (cleric)
> on Ayonae Ro.
>
> I am an officer of Cold Comfort clan (Idaini) and a
> member of Valiant
> Crusaders (Darqheart). I welcome the opportunity to
> meet and discuss
> Norrath with like minded gamers such as yourselves.
>
>
